Day, kunwi, war ccekk, a pcehhdem ar, ar tama n Öebbi, llan iôebbiten nniven"? Ini: "ur cehhde$"! Ini: "Neppa d Öebbi, siwa Yiwen. Nek, rri$ akin ayen tepcarakem".
